Posted By: ultratog1028 (8/18/2010 11:55:11 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@ gradius:  
  
[Weathered Wayfarer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Weathered Wayfarer) is a powerful effect. Consistently getting 2 cards a turn, even if one of them is a land, is worth bouncing a land every now and then. [Land Tax](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Land Tax) effects are done sparsely to give us a real appreciation for them. Unfortunately, the loud design of [Primeval Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primeval Titan) and friends robs us as players of any sort of appreciation for the subtleties of the way we used to play this game. Hell, Titan even stabbed [Realms Uncharted](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Realms Uncharted) in the back. And that was printed exactly prior to M11!
posts.html:
@ gradius:

Weathered Wayfarer is a powerful effect. Consistently getting 2 cards a turn, even if one of them is a land, is worth bouncing a land every now and then. Land Tax effects are done sparsely to give us a real appreciation for them. Unfortunately, the loud design of Primeval Titan and friends robs us as players of any sort of appreciation for the subtleties of the way we used to play this game. Hell, Titan even stabbed Realms Uncharted in the back. And that was printed exactly prior to M11!
